Module downfall
Package downfall.realm.template

Class VisualBuildingTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • downfall.realm.template.BuildingTemplate
      • downfall.realm.template.VisualBuildingTemplate
  • public class VisualBuildingTemplate
extends BuildingTemplate
    Template that is used when new buildings are generated. It stores a pathname that leads to its GFX and an JavaFX Image if a reference to that is required. This Class if fully annotated for use with JAXB to be exported to an XML File.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VisualBuildingTemplate

        public VisualBuildingTemplate()
        Default Constructor. Generates an invalid instance with id set to -1

      • VisualBuildingTemplate

        public VisualBuildingTemplate​(int id,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              int defConstructionCost,
                              int defConstructionTime,
                              boolean operatesImmediately)
        Parameters:
        id - unique identifier used to differentiate different templates
        name - a human-readable name of the template.
        defConstructionCost - construction cost per turn of construction
        defConstructionTime - number of turns it takes to construct a building
        operatesImmediately - does the building operate immediately or do you need to finish its construction

      • VisualBuildingTemplate

        public VisualBuildingTemplate​(int id,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              java.util.List<Material> inputMaterials,
                              java.util.List<Material> outputMaterials,
                              int defConstructionCost,
                              java.util.List<Material> constructionMaterials,
                              int defConstructionTime,
                              boolean operatesImmediately,
                              java.lang.String pathToGFX)
        Parameters:
        id - unique identifier used to differentiate different templates
        name - a human-readable name of the template.
        inputMaterials - a list of input materials that are used in production in this building per turn
        outputMaterials - a list of output materials that are produced in this building per turn
        defConstructionCost - construction cost per turn of construction
        constructionMaterials - a list of materials consumed during construction per turn of construction
        defConstructionTime - number of turns it takes to construct a building
        operatesImmediately - does the building operate immediately or do you need to finish its construction
        pathToGFX - String pathname to an image file that represents this building. That Image should be square, but isn't required to be square

    • Method Detail

      • pathToGFXProperty

        public javafx.beans.property.StringProperty pathToGFXProperty()
        Lightweight Accessor Method
        Returns:
        pathname to an image file that represents this building as a property. That Image should be square, but isn't required to be square

      • getPathToGFX

        public java.lang.String getPathToGFX()
        Lightweight Accessor Method
        Returns:
        String pathname to an image file that represents this building.

      • getGFX

        public javafx.scene.image.Image getGFX()
        Lightweight Accessor Method that initiates graphics if they haven't been initialized
        Returns:
        Image that represents this Building.

      • setPathToGFX

        public void setPathToGFX​(java.lang.String pathToGFX)
        Lightweight Mutator Method
        Parameters:
        pathToGFX - String pathname to an image file that represents this building. That Image should be square, but isn't required to be square

      • updateGFX

        public javafx.scene.image.Image updateGFX()
        Updates the Image representation building to comply with the current value of pathToGFXProperty
        Returns:
        new Image that has been updated.
